mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(num, member_id, subject, content, notice, hit_count, showNotice, reg_date, modify_date) VALUES (#{num}, #{member_id}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{notice}, 0, #{showNotice}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
